Mobbex.JS

Mobbex

Kind: global class

  • Mobbex
    • new Mobbex()
    • .init(api_key, lang)
    • .setLanguage(lang)
    • .getLanguage() ⇒

new Mobbex()

Important
Mobbex Class Can’t be instantiated directly.

Use: window.Mobbex

mobbex.init(api_key, lang)

Iniliaze the Library. The API-Key is required in order to make calls

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)

Param Type Description
api_key string Provided API-Key
lang string Optional

mobbex.setLanguage(lang)

Set the language for responses

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)

Param Type Description
lang any en/es

mobbex.getLanguage() ⇒

Get the current language

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)
Returns: String Current language

mobbex.httpPost(url, data) ⇒

Make an HTTP Post call with the required headers

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)
Returns: Promise

Param Type Description
url string Relative or absolute url to Mobbex
data object Data to be sent

mobbex.httpGet(url, query) ⇒

Makes an HTTP Get call with the required headers

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)
Returns: Promise

Param Type Description
url string Relative or absolute url to Mobbex
query object Query parameters

mobbex.setEntity(id)

Sets the Entity

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)

Param Type Description
id String Entity ID

mobbex.setEntityKey(entity_key)

Set the entity key. If you are using Mobbex 2.0 Entity Key is Required instead of setEntity

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)

Param Type
entity_key string

mobbex.setAccessToken(access_token)

Set the Access Token obtained for an Entity.

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)

Param Type
access_token string

mobbex.setSession(token)

Set the session token

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)

Param Type
token string

mobbex.clearSession()

Remove the session

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)

mobbex.getSources() ⇒

Get Entity Sources

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)
Returns: Promise

mobbex.getInstallmentsBySource(source_id) ⇒

Returns all the Installments available for the Source

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)
Returns: Promise

Param Type Description
source_id String Source ID

mobbex.tokenize(user, source) ⇒

Generates a Token based on a User and a Source

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)
Returns: Promise

Param Type Description
user Object User Data Requires - name: Full name - Email: User Email (Must be Valid) - Identification: Valid ID for the User - Phone: Valid Phone number
source Object Source Data Requires - id: Source ID - number: Source number ( Only for Cards ) - month: Expiration Month ( Only for Cards ) - year: Expiration Year ( Only for Cards ) - cvv: Security Code ( Only for Cards )

mobbex.processTransaction(total, token, utid, installment, extras) ⇒

Process the transaction based on the Token

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)
Returns: Promise

Param Type Description
total Number Amount of the Transaction
token String Generated Token
utid String Unique Transaction ID: ID to identify Transaction and prevent duplicates
installment String Optional Installment ID if required
extras Object Optional Additional parameters

mobbex.transaction(type, data) ⇒

Process a Transaction based on the Type. Most common is Payment

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)
Returns: Promise

Param Type Description
type String Transaction type
data Object Transaction parameters

mobbex.detectSource(source_number) ⇒

Detects a Source based on the Source Number.
This method is useful to detect cards

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)
Returns: Promise

Param Type Description
source_number String Source Number

mobbex.calculate(total, source, installment) ⇒

Given a Total, Source and Installment calculates the charges of the Transaction

Kind: instance method of [Mobbex](#Mobbex)
Returns: Promise

Param Type Description
total Number Total of the Transaction
source String Source ID
installment String Installment ID
